tagline: Freegemas libGDX is an Android, HTML 5 and Java desktop port of Freegemas, which in turn is an open source version of the well known Bejeweled.
body:
freegemas-gdx
=============

Freegemas libGDX is an Android, HTML 5 and Java desktop port of Freegemas, which in turn is an open source version of the well known Bejeweled.

###NEWS###

Freegemas 1.0 has been published in [Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.siondream.freegemas)

###Screenshots###

![Freegemas](http://freegemas-libgdx.googlecode.com/svn/web/freegemas-1.jpg)

![Freegemas](http://freegemas-libgdx.googlecode.com/svn/web/freegemas-2.jpg)
name: Freegemas-gdx
